definition: to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: And a touch of femininity, such as a bow headband can be added to tone down the masculinity.
sentences.chinese: 也可以使用束髮帶之類的飾品來增加女生的柔美。

sentences.english: Where did you find my ski headband?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪裏找到我的滑雪束髮帶？

sentences.english: I know the full value of the snood.
sentences.chinese: 我懂得束髮帶的全部涵義。

sentences.english: After several years circulated, the tube bundle of external catalyst cooler was contorted and metamorphosed and should be replaced.
sentences.chinese: 長時間運行後其管束髮生了扭曲及變形，需要更換。

sentences.english: The soldiers in the vanguard wear short suits, have their hair in buns and hold bows.
sentences.chinese: 士兵身穿短褐，勒帶束髮，手執弓弩，揹負箭囊。

definition: see 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1]
embroidered headband used as decoration by actors or in Hui ethnic group/to reward an actor with brocade headband
item made from woven silk or rayon
Chakravarti raja (Sanskrit: King of Kings)/emperor in Hindu mythology
black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
